name: Cult Fanatic
desc: Fanatics are often part of a cult’s leadership, using their charisma and dogma to influence and prey on those of weak will. Most are interested in personal power above all else.

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
- 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
- 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
